lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I think microloan lending can help people who don't have a lot of options improve their lives.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I never would have made it this far in life without help from others. I'm just passing on some of my good fortune.

lender.name: darby
lender.occupational_info: I'm a nursing assistant. I'm a doula, which involves assisting women in childbirth. I'm a childbirth educator and a nursing student.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are not just looking for a handout. I respect these entrepreneurs and believe they are key to improving life where they live.
lender.occupational_info: Nature and Fine Art Photographer

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: Because I'm a Christian. And because it puts into practice what I learn at university.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at a University in Germany. I'm working on my B.Sc. in Economics, the field where micro-credits have their origin.

lender.name: Synnøve
lender.loan_because: I belive in people. And becauce I can.

lender.name: Isabelle
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people have a good business so that they can be healthy and help their kids go to school like I do.
lender.occupational_info: I go to elementary school so I learn reading, writing, math and I also get to play with my friends

lender.name: Peter
lender.occupational_info: I teach students (15-18 years old) about history, economics, geography and government.

lender.name: Carina
lender.loan_because: Soy profesional universitario, técnico de la facultad de medicina. Pero en mi país si te quedas desempleado, así seas universitario, es muy dificil volver al mercado laboral. Tengo tres hijos pequeños y por lo tanto es muy dificil salir de mi casa, lo que me dificulta más la reinsercción laboral. Por eso estoy desarrollando un proyecto de servicios a distancia, vender dietas y servicios a través de internet. Necesito dinero para equipo, accesorios del pc, una video y cámara de fotos.
lender.occupational_info: Soy nutricionista dietista, egresada de la facultad de medicina. Realizo, dietas, planes de alimentación para personas en general y organizo planes de menú para las familias. Todo esto lo realizo a distancia, a través de internet. También ofresco realizar asesoramiento a empresas de alimentos. Cursos de nutrición a distancia.

lender.name: Carol Jane
lender.loan_because: because I can.

lender.name: Moreau Catholic
lender.loan_because: As a Holy Cross high school, we believe in the importance of helping our students become responsible citizens of our global community. Lending through Kiva provides students an opportunity by which they can become part of helping others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are a co-educational college preparatory high school in the Holy Cross tradition located in Hayward, CA. As an innovative 21st century one-to-one laptop school, we believe in helping students understand their role in the larger global society.

lender.name: Jmm
lender.loan_because: We load to help out others and hopefully make a difference in the lives of many people.
lender.occupational_info: We are the students taking International Business at Memorial High School. We learn about global business as well as gain new knowledge and insights every day in class.

lender.name: Carmel and Jon
lender.loan_because: People the world over just need a little help.
lender.occupational_info: Retiring from work in a big city in California just wasn't for us so we found a big house in a little town in Pennsylvania and are very happy. there.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Letra
lender.occupational_info:
Resiliently unemployed and, And I'm wanting to open my own Cleaning Service, With BONUS Building Care Opening it will give me more time to spend with my boys.Each BONUS Building Care customer receives a cleaning schedule customized for their facility. Your cleaning schedule can be designed to fit the needs of your workplace no matter how unique it may be. Our cleaning goals are to make sure your goals for cleaning are met in your working environment. Decades of experience in the cleaning industry has prepared the management at BONUS Building Care to customize a program of cleaning that will effectively manage and perform the cleaning tasks required in your workplace.
Nightly Cleaning Procedures are conducted by:
Insured, bonded security conscious cleaning crews Trained personnel equipped with commercial equipment Inspected by our operations staff for quality insurance Our Customer Service and communication programs enable you, the customer, to control the level of attention and service you receive.
We have the solution to any cleaning problem you may have and would like the opportunity to provide you with a fully customized cleaning program for your workplace. Night after night we take great pride in providing only the best in service. Why not let us provide it for you?
Each BONUS Building Care customer receives a cleaning schedule customized for their facility. Your cleaning schedule can be designed to fit the needs of your workplace no matter how unique it may be. Our cleaning goals are to make sure your goals for cleaning are met in your working environment.
Decades of experience in the cleaning industry has prepared the management at BONUS Building Care to customize a program of cleaning that will effectively manage and perform the cleaning tasks required in your workplace.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I believe that to change the world, even minutely, today, will help countless others in time.
lender.occupational_info: Banker

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others reach their goals.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are in need, and more importantly those who will work towards helping themselves with a little boost from the money I can lend them.

lender.name: Eric
lender.occupation: Real Estate Broker/ Youth Ministry Director
lender.loan_because: I want to share the love of Christ

lender.name: Miriam
lender.loan_because: I read about the needs across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sole caregiver for a handicapped husband.

lender.name: Yann
lender.loan_because: when I see the outrageous amount of money that Banks make out of trading on Poverty, it makes me feel bit better to try and help avoid more victims of their cupidity.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the mail order industry. My job consists in delivering ideas that make my patron's customers happy to purchase from them.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: Everyone should be given a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Self-employeed

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like to help people in an unhelpful world.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneurial business consulting... lecture Principles of Microeconomics on occasion at Virginia Commonwealth University.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: God directs me to as a steward for His kingdom.
lender.occupational_info: I pray and and ask God for clear directions on what to do with money. Then I do what He tells me. Its enjoyable work.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I believe there is a need for help that contributes to raising the independence and the self-esteem of the client, rather than help that keeps the recipient in a state of dependence and inferiority. That's why I want to make a part of my private means available for emerging market entrepreneurs with a capital need.
lender.occupational_info: My support will primarily go individuals and cooperatives with the most moderate funding needs. That way I hope to reach out and help as many of my fellow human beings that I possibly can and to make a positive impact on their life and future prospects. In my own daily life I work for NOKIA making mobile phone applications and services particularly addressing the needs of people in emerging market countries.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: I'm cool.

lender.name: Greener LA
lender.loan_because: We understand that a single person has the potential to make an enormous impact on our world and environment. We loan because we care about our fellow citizens of the world and we believe in working together for a better tomorrow.
lender.occupational_info: Greener L.A. is Southern California's premier home and commercial cleaning company. We are committed to cleaning with a conscience in order to benefit the health and lives of our customers. Commercially, we are dedicated to working with businesses to create progressive sustainability solutions to reduce their carbon footprint and detoxicate their working environment to the benefit of employees and the planet.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: It takes so little to help another human being.

lender.name: RBH International
lender.loan_because: Though the struggles of life can seem insurmountable at times; the kindness and support from friends can foster hope for a better tomorrow. I believe in the loan recipients, the lenders and Kiva. It is my pleasure and honor to help. Best of Luck!
lender.occupational_info: RBH International is a dynamic business development company. " We nurture ideas and dreams until they come true"

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I can at this point and time in my life even though I'm a student.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I found out about this when given a gift certificate, and I think it's a great idea.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: If you can, you should.

lender.name: Ray&Jeyah
lender.loan_because: Help other children and their moms live better lives.

lender.name: Bruna
lender.loan_because: I want to support people with great ideas who are trying to earn a living in an honest and hard-working manner.

lender.name: Lydia
lender.occupational_info: I'm an eighth grade student at Meadow Montessori School in Monroe, Michigan.

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to provide a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Because of my mother who started loaning in 2007. I continue to loan in loving memory of her and her generosity.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupational_info: Informing the public about politics and their government.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I am grateful to Kiva for providing a way of loaning money, in small amounts that I can afford, to people who need it, and allowing them to repay at a rate that they can afford. This gives me a way to help others around the world, even if it is only in a small way. Thank you, Kiva!

lender.name: Tormey
lender.loan_because: I'm a student, so I don't have much money, and Kiva is a place where I can give my money and not lose it forever. I'm helping people, and in the long run I don't lose anything, even if I have to make small sacrifices to begin with.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student, studying the International Baccalaureate (IB) at The Friends' School in Hobart, Tasmania, Australia. I am taking seven subjects: English, Maths, Chinese (second language), Biology, Chemistry, Philosophy and ToK. ToK stands for "Theory of Knowlegde" and we ask questions like "How do we know things?" and "How are we sure that we are right? Are we sure?"

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I believe that educated, creative women are the hope of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach writing, I'm a painter, I sing with a blues band.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: It's fun!
lender.occupational_info: I help people cope with life and improve their relationships.

lender.name: Dominic
lender.loan_because: I seek to make a positive difference in the world we live in
lender.occupational_info: I build ideas into tools that save the lives of people

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: My Captain asked me to.
lender.occupational_info: I taught biology classes for college students.

lender.name: Keri
lender.loan_because: I want to make a bigger difference for the world than I can locally in our rich nation.
lender.occupational_info: I am a singer, creating music, which has the power to transform people emotionally.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: It seems like a small thing I can do with great love.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, I study and learn, a lot. I make money by talking on the phone for a few hours every day.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: My small business changed my life and someone helped me. Their name was Citibank. I want to do the same thing for others on a much smaller scale without the crippling interest rate.
lender.occupational_info: I make jewelry, silkscreen clothing and sell craft components.

lender.name: Hippy
lender.loan_because: my pet squirrel will beat me up if I don't.

lender.name: toxic4brain
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of microfinance and the way Kive handles that, with the peer to peer transactions. Its the best way to give people & later maybe the hole Region, the opportunity to finance their lifes and Familys.
lender.occupational_info:
i am married, have 3 kids & i help people with computers and their networks.
Life`s a wave, enjoy the ride :)

lender.name: Keren
lender.loan_because: The best way to lift some out of poverty is to give them the means to do it themself.

lender.occupational_info: I am a student of biology at ASU. While in school, I'm working for Apple, Inc.

lender.loan_because: Spotlight on New York City. A free video business directory for New York City… Home, Health & Wellness, Restaurants/Entertainment, Retail and Services.Video marketing is a must for all businesses

lender.name: Eben
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the resources to help themselves in the way they know is best for them. I believe a loan should carry an agreement of repayment, not a commitment to 'structural adjustment', privatisation and the loss of the borrower's rights and dignity.

lender.loan_because: I got interrested in the microfinance concept long time back and like this concept to help people to help themselves.

Is there a better way of using money?

lender.loan_because: People need money

lender.name: Ricardo and Juanita
lender.loan_because: ...in Deuteronomy 16:17, the Lord says "every man shall give as he is able, according to the blessing of the Lord your God which He has given you."
lender.occupational_info: I work in business development for a company providing technical services to the goverment. My wife is a Physical Therapist who provides rehabilitative services to mentally/physically challenged people.

lender.name: Edith
lender.occupational_info: I study sociology at Aalborg University

lender.name: Gullan
lender.loan_because: every one should have a fair chance!
lender.occupational_info: I teach students from all over the world at the Multimedia design school in Chopenhagen og it is so rewarding:)

lender.name: Hans Erik
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of micro loans. With the same amount you´re able to help people over and over again.
lender.occupational_info: I was a truckdriver and an author, strange but true. After being seriously ill I gave up trucking, and now I try to make a living from my writing and my photography.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I believe I'm a citizen of the world, not just my own country. This is a small way for me to support the hard work of others to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach business classes in high school, and English classes in college.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I would appreciate if some one was there for me.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: it feels great to help someone build their dreams and be rewarded for their hard work.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small non-profit that provides healthcare to low-income, frail, elderly people in our community. In my job, I negotiate contracts with the compaines that provide supplies for our clinics. I try to get the best pricing so that we can make the best use of our funds to care for more people who need our services.

lender.name: jesper
lender.loan_because: I want to share what I have and reach out to someone in need who really just need a little help to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: student

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I would love to help single mothers and other women who could use some money to help their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I study hard and try to do my best to get good grades in school.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupation: Quilt designer, author, small B&B proprietor
lender.loan_because: It's a privilege to be able to give a helping hand up to hard working people who deserve a chance to succeed and better their lives and the lives of their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: Semi retired from 30+ years of being a sole proprietor entrepreneur in retail, publishing, wholesale and product design.

lender.name: John M
lender.loan_because: I believe in the Law of Attraction and the Spiritual principle of Tithing! I enjoy helping others!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a part of a team that provides a unique business model to generate an income for any business. I believe in the continuous research on ways to make money from home and dedicate myself to working with systems that offer multiple streams of income. It is my passion to help others achieve SUCCESS online and offer them the training & support required to do so!

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.loan_because: I just think the idea of micro-loans is great. I guess that getting a loan to start / continue some kind of business keeps dreams alive much better than just getting money. Bread is important - school is important - and dreams are very important.
lender.occupational_info: I teach High School subjects (Danish and English) to grown-ups. My students are people who either never got an education when they were young - or they have for some reason or another dropped out from High School at an earlier point in their lives. I think it's a very rewarding job.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Robin Senseney
lender.loan_because: Why keep all your money stuffed under a mattress when you can do so much good with it?
lender.occupational_info:
I work on making websites better...like Kiva!
I spend all my time on the computer so there is no need to ever cut my hair.

lender.name: Mark & Sharon
lender.loan_because: Tom Arbuckle brought the idea of forming a kiva.org group to the Michigan Tech Alumni Association. It's a great idea and the Board of Directors agreed wholeheartedly. We like kiva.org because you can see where your loans are going. These are great stories of deserving people who want to make better lives for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: The Michigan Tech Alumni Association has over 52,000 members all over the world. Many of these alumni work for a number of philanthropic causes. I hope this kiva.org group will give our members the means to further fund good works across the world.

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: I want to help and this way is so concrete. I believe, that most people prefer to get a loan and the satisfaction of seeing there hopes coming to pass by their own effort more that just the gift of a donation, which many people in need feel bad receiving confirming their need or poverty as status as less worthy. By these loans they can have their feeling of acomplishment and worth.
lender.occupational_info: I am a multi-artist, designer, idea maker and creator in many fields.
